item.title: OpenSSL test TLSv1.3 connection and ciphersuites with s_client
item.description: This guide shows you how to test a server's TLSv1.3 connection and use specific ciphersuites with the command line s_client client from the OpenSSL project. With OpenSSL 1.1.1 you can use TLSv1.3. This guide covers the installation of OpenSSL 1.1.1 on Ubuntu, testing the connection to a server and specific ciphersuites. It also covers the big differences between TLSv1.3 and lower.
